question: 詐欺師
sourceMnemonic: You know that <ja>詐欺</ja> is "fraud." An <kanji>expert</kanji> in fraud is someone who does this it lot, and possibly for a living. That's a <vocabulary>swindler</vocabulary>, a <vocabulary>con artist</vocabulary>,  or a <vocabulary>scammer</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Will help to know the reading of <ja>詐欺</ja> as well.
